replies.body: The hive says thank you for 2nd :)

If...if I speak to one bee does the whole hive hear?

Hope you enjoyed the contest!

WOWOWOW I'M FLOORED

{{sticker:sg-zephyr}} 

I was definitely not expecting such an amazing response T^T

Thank you so much for voting for me and a huge thanks to the Rioters who organised this competition. It was super fun and I had an absolute blast writing for it!

Congrats on your win! :D

Because we submitted your entry remotely due to the tech hiccups I don't have your email address - so I've just added you on League! Ping me a message on the client and we'll arrange your prize.

\*blinks*

I placed? Huzzah! That's a nice present to wake up to. Thanks to everyone who voted for me!

And I was even right in my guesses about which stories would take first and second! Today has been a good day.

(While I remember: hey, Achenar, now that the competition is over, is there any way—assuming it exists—to find out the Riot shortlisting panel's feedback on our stories? I'd like to know what they thought and what I could have done better).
Congrats! :D I've popped you an email with some info about your prize and some feedback. :)

Are we going to get another competition like this sometime soon?
I had a lot of fun submitting a story and entering (even if my story was overshadowed by the better stories such as the winners)
welp theres always next year ...*cries because writing skills weren't good enough*
Congratulations Alisu, Angrier Bee and Magery, It was great reading everyone's submissions.
